page.title: 19Farm Animals in Local Area
page.content: In this area because the soil is so rich it is mainly used for the growing of crops rather than the grazing for animals.The grazing land is used mostly for dairy cows and fat cattle to produce good meat and milk. In the Newburgh area the most common farm animals to be found are fat cattle,dairy cows and sheep.Many of the local farms just concentrate on the 1 type of animal and in that way the farm can produce more and better products. Other types of farm animals you can find in this area are pigs,goats,hens and ponies.Shetland ponies are kept as pets for children.Afew farms also keep horses for riding.Goats are useful for the milk they can produce.Pigs provide not just meat but good fertilizer for the land.The hens are free range and are kept for the eggs which they lay.
